/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, giving a sense of the city's towering buildings and busy streets. The buildings, predominantly white and gray, rise high into the clear blue sky, punctuated by a few scattered clouds. The street below is a hive of activity, filled with cars and buses navigating their way through the city's arteries. Trees line the sides of the street, providing a touch of greenery amidst the urban landscape. The sun shines brightly, casting a warm glow over the scene and highlighting the vibrant colors of the cityscape.
